transcript: if you think of earning potential as the total amount of value that you can exchange with the marketplace you're going to be compensated in some way in money and experience some makeup of that if you come in to a business smaller percentages money then you are providing more value than you're being compensated for and if you in a good company you'll be compensated back in excess of what that experience is that will further increase your earning potential and then you can even trade that earning potential for again a bigger chunk of cash but you still have Goodwill built into the exchange with the business
